授業目的: The purpose of this course is to familiarize students with the IELTS test
到達目標: Students will be able to understand the general structure of the IELTS test
授業方法:
Individual work
Pair work
Information for students permitted to take classes online.
Students will be able to complete the work at home. All the essay titles will be sent to the student by email and the students can complete the work and submit it by email. Written feedback on each essay will be given by the teacher. Students need ing extra help can arrange a 1-to-1 zoom meeting with the teacher AS NEEDED.

第1回: Students will be given a Reading pack. They will be required to complete it and hand it in by the last class.
第2回:
Reading test - overview and practice
Listening section - overview
第8回: Mid-term test - Writing Type 1 and Type 2
第14回: Final test - Reading test and writing test
